Dude !!! u rock man!!! Amazing release dat 2 so soon....... Keep up the gr8 work....

Imp Note :- Part 1 Of Movie have 1 sec of Audio Delay that cant be fix
I have Try a Lot But Source was having that Problem So Cant Solve it
Part 2 Works Fine :D

But Its Watchable :D
Play In Media Player Classic To Fix it :D

Solution 

After playing half Movie when u Get Problem 
Pause it n Press o 
new Tab will Open select Internal Filter in that
Audio Switcher Enable it n now Select Audio time Shift (ms) 
Make it 500
Than Apply Ok
N Audio Is Fixed :D

when u open part 2 make that Option Disable 
So Becz part 2 Dont have problem

Sorry for This Trouble but source was having Problem :(

but after this Solution u will surly Enjoy Movie :D

hey ProDudeAk just download mediavideoconverter mkv converter v3.0.2 its works

1sec    = 1000ms
1/2sec = 500ms
1/4sec = 250ms

In Part 1 After half Movie Aduio is 1/2 sec ahed so make it 500Ms
Its working Fine Than :D
